html.p: This is dubh.org. It's kind of a mish-mash of various techy bits and bobs, maintained by Brian Duff.
This site is currently under construction. Many of the inviting links on the left don't actually go anywhere yet.

box.title: What's New?
box.p: Dubh.Org discussion forums are now online at http://talk.dubh.org. More forums will be added over the next few days.
The CVS browser is back online at http://cvs.dubh.org, and has been upgraded to the latest JCVS Servlet.
Added the Project Marco Database Design document.
New XML Technology page, with live newsfeeds!
New layout for dubh.org index page.
Project Marco aims to provide a hosted bookmarks service for multiple users. An initial draft of the requirements are now online
